meanings.definition: The beliefs or teachings of Alessandro Volta.

meanings.sent5: The book vividly described the voltaisms of the famous scientist.

meanings.definition: Expressions or phrases characteristic of Alessandro Volta.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed various voltaisms from his letters.
meanings.sent2: People often quote voltaisms to illustrate his thoughts.
